ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): if (widget.Entity.Handle.IsInvalid()): return
statusCadastrado = 1 statusDivergente = 2 statusLiberado = 5
statusPai = widget.Entity.Status()
podeAlterar = (statusPai == statusCadastrado or statusPai == statusDivergente or statusPai == statusLiberado)
widget.View.Commands["EDIT"].Visible = podeAlterar widget.View.Commands["DELETE"].Visible = podeAlterar widget.View.Commands["NEW"].Visible = podeAlterar
